      Returns:

    • sendRecommendationNotifications

      @PostMapping("/notify/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> sendRecommendationNotifications(@PathVariable String userId, @RequestParam(defaultValue="3") int maxRecommendations)
      sends recommendation notifications to a specific user
      Parameters:
      maxRecommendations - - max number of notifications per user (optional, standard: 3)
      Returns:
      Confirmation of success

    • sendSummaryRecommendationNotifications

      @PostMapping("/notify/{userId}/summary") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> sendSummaryRecommendationNotifications(@PathVariable String userId, @RequestParam(defaultValue="5") int maxRecommendations)
      sends recommendation summary notification to a specific user
      Parameters:
      maxRecommendations - - max number of recommendations to include (optional, standard: 5)
      Returns:
      Confirmation of success

    • sendRecommendationNotificationsToAll

      @PostMapping("/notify/all") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> sendRecommendationNotificationsToAll(@RequestParam(defaultValue="3") int maxRecommendations)
      sends recommendation notifications to all users
      Parameters:
      maxRecommendations - - max number of notifications per user (optional, standard: 3)

      Confirmation of success

    • sendTriggeredRecommendations

      @PostMapping("/notify/{userId}/triggered") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> sendTriggeredRecommendations(@PathVariable String userId, @RequestParam String trigger)
      sends triggered recommendations based on user activity
      Parameters:
      userId - - id of the user
      trigger - the trigger (e.g. "new_favorite", "new_rating")

      Confirmation of success
